name: Beak Bang
description:
Welcome to Beak Bang! Help Beaky explore the wonders of nature by solving colorful hexagonal levels and beautiful jigsaw puzzles! Join now - the adventure awaits!

Switch and match hexagonal tiles to create epic chain reactions and powerful combos! Find the missing jigsaw puzzle pieces by beating colorful levels! Travel through nature in blissful beaches, wide oceans and exotic jungles! Play with beach balls, enjoy sailboats, take pictures and crack coconuts during the journey! Dig your way through ice walls using rockets, bombs and the special ring bomb. Earn daily gifts and unlock rewards by collecting stars and completing levels!

Features:
- Unique and fresh match-3 gameplay!
- Relaxing jigsaw puzzles with beautiful pictures!
- Switch and match to create epic chain reactions!
- Powerful boosters and weapons!
- Simple to learn hard to master!
- Tons of challenging levels and exciting episodes!
- Unlock rewards by completing levels and collecting stars!

Come and join the adventure now!
